testcase.name: Verify Links in the Sidebar Menu

testcase.name: Verify Icons in the Navbar

testcase.name: User Verifies Chat button
testcase.system-out: Given I logged in and was on the dashboard page.............................passed When I click the chatbot button.............................................passed And I select and click the chat button......................................passed Then I should provide information for Chatbot...............................passed

testcase.name: User Returns to the Dashboard Page from the Chatbot Page
testcase.system-out: Given I logged in and was on the dashboard page.............................passed When I click the chatbot button.............................................passed And I click the return button...............................................passed Then I should be redirected to the dashboard page...........................passed
